resources:
"Brave Exvius Guide "
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Settings "An esper that was long ago sealed away in Siren\'s Tower due to its fearsome power. It looks like a bewitching young woman with beautiful wings like those of bird. Those who hear its heavenly voice were said to be mesmerized by it\'s power that they would throw themselves into the sea" "Stats" "Status" "Initial Value" "Max Value (1*)" "Max Value (2*)" "Cure" "Heal (150HP, 3x) to one ally" "Cleanse" "Cure disease to one ally" "Blind" "Blind (40%) to one enemy" "Sleep" "Sleep (40%) to one enemy" "Analyze" "View info on one enemy" "Alluring Air" "Confuse (30%) to all enemies" "Attack Song" "ATK +(40%) 3 turns to all allies" "Defense Song" "DEF +(40%) 3 turns to all allies" "Paean" "Heal 3 turns to all allies" "Water" "Water magic damage (1.2x) ST" "Barwater" "+Water resist(30%) for 3 turns ST" "Shell"> "-SPR (20%) for 3 turns ST"> "Deshell"> "-SPR (20%) for 3 turns ST"> "Dispell"> "Remove all buffs from target">
